entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 12:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
